Languages: Dwarven

Features
Edges (0 points): Block; Blood And Guts; Courageous; Double Shot; Favored Foe; Giant Killer; Improved Double Shot; Improved Giant Killer; Improved Snow Walker; Improved Sunder; Mighty Shot; Mighty Throw; Necromantic Severing; Oversized Weapon Master; Scamper; Shieldwall; Snow Walker; Sunder; Wall Of Steel; War Cry Hindrances: Cautious; Clueless+; Cold Blooded; Hard Of Hearing Frost Dwarf Features: Heat Lethargy; Insular; Low Light Vision; Mountain-Born; Slow; Tough; Winter Soul
Feature Notes:
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Combat
Parry: 9 (1) Cover: 2 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d6
Armor: Scale Hauberk Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Antler Staff (d10+d6); Battle Axe (d10+d8); Bow (d10+d6 R12"); Long Bow (d10+d6 R15"); Throwing Axe (d10+d6 R4"); Twin Toothpick (d10+d8); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Block: +1 Parry
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Improved Double Shot: Increased Double Shot effects
Improved Snow Walker: Increased Snow Walker effects
Improved Sunder: Increased Sunder effects
Mighty Shot: Bow does d10+d6 damage
Mighty Throw: +1 thrown weapon range/+1 Strength step for short throws
Slow: -1 Pace
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Antler Staff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Blood And Guts: Halves negative difference between tokens when attacking in mass battle
Double Shot: May fire two arrows at one target
Favored Foe: +1 Parry and d8 extra damage on attack Raise against chosen creature type
Giant Killer: +1d6 damage vs. foes of size 3 or greater
Improved Giant Killer: May ignore Armor or Size benefits of creatures of Size 3 or greater
Mountain-Born: No difficult terrain penalty in hills and mountains
Necromantic Severing: May make called shots vs. undead
Oversized Weapon Master: May use two-handed weapons with one hand
Scamper: Larger foes -1 attack
Shieldwall: Shield benefit applies to adjacent ally
Snow Walker: Moves full speed over snow and ice
Sunder: +2 AP with any weapon
Wall Of Steel: Foes gain no Gang Up bonus
War Cry: May make Intimidation test against all in 3" radius
Winter Soul: +2 Armor vs. cold attacks
Notes
Validation Errors:

Edge Allocation: 0 available vs. 20 allocated
